html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-13332024-12-16CIRNAC
ActFirst Nations Fiscal Management Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Regulations Made Under the First Nations Fiscal Management Act (Miscellaneous Program)
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FIRST NATIONS FISCAL MANAGEMENT ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct outdated references to the enabling legislation, namely the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act, which is now the First Nations Fiscal Management Act; (2) harmonize terms with those used in enabling statutes and related regulations; (3) replace the English version of the marginal notes "limitation period" with the term "appeal period"; (4) replace the French version of the term "évaluateur fiscal" to "administrateur fiscal"; and (5) update the reference from the "Native Law Centre" to the "Indigenous Law Centre".
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0277 Publication Date: 2025-01-01
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN REGULATIONS MADE UNDER THE FIRST NATIONS FISCAL MANAGEMENT ACT (MISCELLANEOUS PROGRAM) in order to (1) correct outdated references to the enabling legislation, namely the First Nations Fiscal and Statistical Management Act, which is now the First Nations Fiscal Management Act; (2) harmonize terms with those used in enabling statutes and related regulations; (3) replace the English version of the marginal notes "limitation period" with the term "appeal period"; (4) replace the French version of the term "évaluateur fiscal" to "administrateur fiscal"; and (5) update the reference from the "Native Law Centre" to the "Indigenous Law Centre".
